naslov: Najam - Prekrasna samostojeća kuća 450 m2 - Hoto vile (iznajmljivanje)
opis: Najam - Prekrasna samostojeća kuća 450 m2 - Hoto vile Dajemo u najam prekrasnu samostojeću kuću izgrađenu 2005. godine u Strmcu, Hoto vile. Prostire se na 4 etaže. Podzemna etaža 100 m2 sastoji se od garaže za četiri automobila, prostorije s kuhinjom i vešeraja s toaletom. Prizemlje se sastoji od velikog dnevnog boravka povezanog s prostorom za blagovanje kao open space prostor, kuhinje,  toaleta s predsobljem, loggie i velike terase. Prvi kat se sastoji od hodnika, dvije spavaće sobe, velike spavaće sobe s garderobnom sobom i kupaonicom i kupaonice s toaletom. Drugi kat se sastoji od drugog dnevnog boravka s kuhinjom, spavaće sobe, kupaonice s toaletom i terase. Kući prida prekrasan privatni vrt u stražnjem dijelu parcele s roštiljem, garaža u koju stanu 4 automobila + parkirna mjesta ispred. Kuća je kompletno opremljena i namještena. Odlična i mirna lokacija; blizina busa; blizina svih potrebnih sadržaja.Režije po stvarnoj potrošnji (plinsko etažno grijanje). _______________________________________________ Lease - Beautiful Detached House 450 m2 - Hoto Vile We offer for lease a stunning detached house built in 2005 in Strmec, Hoto Vile. It spans across 4 floors. The underground floor of 100 m2 consists of a garage for four cars, a room with a kitchen, and a laundry room with a toilet. The ground floor comprises a large living room connected to the dining area as an open space, a kitchen, a toilet with a hallway, a loggia, and a large terrace. The first floor features a hallway, two bedrooms, a large bedroom with a dressing room and a bathroom, and a bathroom with a toilet. The second floor consists of another living room with a kitchen, a bedroom, a bathroom with a toilet, and a terrace. The house boasts a beautiful private garden at the rear of the plot with a barbecue area, a garage that fits 4 cars, plus parking spaces in front. The house is fully equipped and furnished. Excellent and peaceful location; close to the bus stop; proximity to all necessary amenities. Utilities are based on actual consumption (gas central heating). Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Petrinjska 22, Zagreb Federica Grisogona 8, Zadar
